value.string:
from Products.ZSQLCatalog.SQLCatalog import Query, ComplexQuery
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 software_instance = state_change["object"]
 sale_packing_list_line = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type="Sale Packing List Line",
 aggregate_relative_url=software_instance.getRelativeUrl())
 computer_partition = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Computer Partition")
 
 slave_instance_query = ComplexQuery(
 Query(aggregate_portal_type="Slave Instance"),
 Query(aggregate_validation_state=["%requested", "stopped"]),
 operator="AND")
 computer_partition_query = Query(aggregate_relative_url=computer_partition.getRelativeUrl())
 query = ComplexQuery(computer_partition_query, slave_instance_query, operator="AND")
 
 sale_packing_list_line_list = portal.portal_catalog(
 portal_type='Sale Packing List Line', query=query)
 
 for sale_packing_list_line in sale_packing_list_line_list:
 slave_instance = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Slave Instance")
 slave_instance.startComputerPartition()
